alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 23 at 1:23PM MST until December 25 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches, higher totals possible around Elk River. Highest snow intensities are expected Friday afternoon and evening. For the winter storm watch, heavy snow transitioning to heavy mixed precipitation. Total snow accumulations 1 to 5 inches and total ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch possible. * WHERE...Elk River, Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters, and Pierce. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Saturday. For the winter storm watch, from Saturday afternoon through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and low visibility. Side roads could become treacherous Saturday night through Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
